heading: HR00172
0: A RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE COMMITTEE ON OVERSEAS WORKERS AFFAIRS AND COMMITTEE ON FOREIGN AFFAIRS OF THE HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES TO INVESTIGATE IN AID OF LEGISLATION THE PLIGHT OF THOUSANDS OF OVERSEAS FILIPINO WORKERS WORKING IN VARIOUS CONSTRUCTION COMPANIES WHO REMAIN STRANDED IN THE KINGDOM OF SAUDI ARABIA WITH UNPAID SALARIES FOR MONTHS AND GETTING LAID OFF WITHOUT GETTING END-OF-SERVICE BENEFITS
status: Pending with the Committee on OVERSEAS WORKERS AFFAIRS since 2016-09-19
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00172
FULL TITLE : A RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE COMMITTEE ON OVERSEAS WORKERS AFFAIRS AND COMMITTEE ON FOREIGN AFFAIRS OF THE HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES TO INVESTIGATE IN AID OF LEGISLATION THE PLIGHT OF THOUSANDS OF OVERSEAS FILIPINO WORKERS WORKING IN VARIOUS CONSTRUCTION COMPANIES WHO REMAIN STRANDED IN THE KINGDOM OF SAUDI ARABIA WITH UNPAID SALARIES FOR MONTHS AND GETTING LAID OFF WITHOUT GETTING END-OF-SERVICE BENEFITS
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : MONTORO, TEODORO "TED" G.
DATE FILED : 2016-08-08
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON OVERSEAS WORKERS AFFAIRS ON 2016-09-19
PREVIOUS COMMITTEE REFERRALS :PRIMARILY REFERRED TO RULES on 2016-08-09;
